Package duke.component

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • duke.component.Storage
  • public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents Storage object that stores tasks user need to do. Tasks are stored in a test file. The 'Storage' class supports operators (i) loading TaskList object from text file, (ii) converting a line of text to Task object, (iii) adding text to text file, (iv) changig text in text file and (v) amending text in text file.
